Description: Road is full of potholes and corrugations between Merredin and Kalgoorlie. Dangerous to drive on.
Road is in appallingly condition, and needs widening, and the edges levelling.
Lack of Safe Overtaking Opportunities as in Overtaking Lanes between Merredin and Southern Cross

Main risk: Poor road markings or no edge-lines
Description: Great eastern highway need a complete risk assessment done
Vehicles dropping of the road due to rough surface, near misses from lack of overtaking lanes and added traffic
Several near miss, Vehicles being physically thrown/bounced into the path of oncoming vehicles with nowhere to go to escape
Road is high risk with the amount of pot holes and surface badly deteriorated

Road surface is rough, uneven and the edges are crumbling. Not enough overtaking opportunities considering it is a major truck route. Too narrow for the amount of heavy vehicles that use it daily! We've witnessed dangerous overtaking on GEH by impatient drivers too. Very unpleasant - and at times scary - to drive
